title: Dispatches.Iraqs.Lost.Generation.2008.03.16.WS.PDTV.XviD-GMA.avi
description:
Cutting-edge documentary series. Five years after the US-led invasion
of Iraq, journalist Sharmeen Obaid-Chinoy travels to Syria and Jordan
to investigate the plight of Iraqi refugees. Once the professional
middle classes of their home country, the refugees have been driven
out by violence and civil breakdown and forced to live a desperate
existence abroad.

Note: Feel free to upload this elsewhere, but please include
this NFO and retain the original filenames. Thanks!
